parameters.description: needed on a rows level request (value=all for post/put method or a get/delete all)
parameters.name: rows

parameters.description: needed on a columns level request (POST/PUT/DELETE with no rows query params) will set up a view on row level (show only expected columns)
parameters.name: columns

parameters.description: sets up a sql order in query (don't even try to inject you little joker)
parameters.name: orderby

parameters.description: sets up a sql direction in query (ex.ASC|DESC) (don't even try to inject you little joker)
parameters.name: dir

parameters.description: set 'enable' to activate a response without the main response format (only available if super admin)
